item.description:
This is a really pretty course and challenging. I booked two T times for Saturday at 2:42 and 2:51 which is their twilight rate. Normal rates are $75 but after 2:30 we get it for $50/person with cart and $180 per foursome.

I'll collect $1 from everyone for meetup website fee.

If anyone needs to reach me my cell #339-224-1377.
item.how_to_find_us: at the clubhouse 15 minutes before T time

group.name: The Boston and Beyond Golf Group

item.name: MeadowCreek - Sat 7/24 2:40pm
